languages.text: {n}Сплетя пальцы с вашими, Джай прижимается к вам и шепчет на ухо:{/n} "Хоть к Трону Великого, хоть в ледяные преисподнии, любим{mf|ый|ая}. Куда ты, туда и я".

{n}Jae intertwines her fingers with yours, snuggles up to you and whispers in your ear,{/n} "To the Exalted One's throne or into a cold abyss, it matters not, my beloved. Wherever you go, I will follow."
languages.original_text: {n}Сплетя пальцы с вашими, Джай прижимается к вам и шепчет на ухо:{/n} "Хоть к Трону Великого, хоть в ледяные преисподнии, любим{mf|ый|ая}. Куда ты, туда и я".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae intertwines her fingers with yours, snuggles up to you and whispers in your ear:{/n} "To the Exalted One's throne or to the icy hells, it matters not, my beloved. Wherever you go, I will follow."

{n}Jae intertwines her fingers with yours, snuggles up to you and whispers in your ear:{/n} "To the Exalted One's throne or to the icy hells, it matters not, my beloved. Wherever you go, I will follow."

{n}Jae intertwines her fingers with yours, snuggles up to you and whispers in your ear,{/n} "To the Exalted One's throne or to the icy hells, it matters not, my beloved. Wherever you go, I will follow."

{n}Jae intertwines her fingers with yours, snuggles up to you and whispers in your ear,{/n} "To the Exalted One's throne or to the icy hells, it matters not, my beloved. Wherever you go, I will follow."

{n}Jae intertwines her fingers with yours, snuggles up to you and whispers in your ear,{/n} "To the Exalted One's throne or into a cold abyss, it matters not, my beloved. Wherever you go, I will follow."

languages.text: {n}婕伊与你十指相缠，依偎在你身边，在你耳边轻声开了口。{/n}“无论我们要去的地方是至高无上的黄金王座，还是冰冷的深渊，都无关紧要，我的挚爱。无论你去哪里，我都会跟在你身边。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae intertwines her fingers with yours, snuggles up to you and whispers in your ear,{/n} "To the Exalted One's throne or into a cold abyss, it matters not, my beloved. Wherever you go, I will follow."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊与你十指相缠，依偎在你身边，在你耳边轻声开了口。{/n}“无论我们要去的地方是至高无上的黄金王座，还是冰冷的地狱，都无关紧要，我的挚爱。无论你去哪里，我都会跟在你身边。”

languages.text: {n}Jae entrelaza sus dedos con los tuyos, se acurruca a tu lado y te susurra en el oído:{/n} «Al trono del Exaltado o a un abismo helado, querid{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}, me da igual. Allá donde vayas, yo te seguiré».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae intertwines her fingers with yours, snuggles up to you and whispers in your ear,{/n} "To the Exalted One's throne or into a cold abyss, it matters not, my beloved. Wherever you go, I will follow."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae entrelaza sus dedos con los tuyos, se acurruca a tu lado y te susurra en el oído:{/n} «Al trono del Exaltado o a los infiernos helados, querid{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}, me da igual. Allá donde vayas, yo te seguiré».

languages.text: {n}ジェイは指を絡め、あなたに寄り添い、耳元でささやく。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワンの王座に行くとしても、奈落の底へ向かうとしても、大したことじゃないさ、愛しい人。アンタがどこへ行こうとも、アタシはついていく」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae intertwines her fingers with yours, snuggles up to you and whispers in your ear,{/n} "To the Exalted One's throne or into a cold abyss, it matters not, my beloved. Wherever you go, I will follow."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは指を絡め、あなたに寄り添い、耳元でささやく。{/n}「エグザルテッド・ワンの王座に行くとしても、氷の地獄へ向かうとしても、大したことじゃないさ、愛しい人。アンタがどこへ行こうとも、アタシはついていく」

languages.text: {n}Jae verschränkt ihre Finger mit den deinen, schmiegt sich an dich und flüstert dir ins Ohr:{/n} "Ob zum Thron des Erhabenen oder in einen eisigen Abgrund, das ist mir gleichgültig, mein Schatz. Wohin Ihr auch geht, ich werde Euch folgen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae intertwines her fingers with yours, snuggles up to you and whispers in your ear,{/n} "To the Exalted One's throne or into a cold abyss, it matters not, my beloved. Wherever you go, I will follow."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae verschränkt ihre Finger mit den deinen, schmiegt sich an dich und flüstert dir ins Ohr:{/n} "Ob zum Thron des Erhabenen oder in die eisigen Höllen, das ist mir gleichgültig, mein Schatz. Wohin Ihr auch geht, ich werde Euch folgen."

languages.text: {n}Jae imbrique ses doigts dans les vôtres avant de se blottir contre vous et de vous murmurer à l'oreille :{/n} « Jusqu'au trône de l'Exalté ou dans les abysses glacials, peu m'importe, mon amour. Je vous suivrai où que vous alliez. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae intertwines her fingers with yours, snuggles up to you and whispers in your ear,{/n} "To the Exalted One's throne or into a cold abyss, it matters not, my beloved. Wherever you go, I will follow."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae imbrique ses doigts dans les vôtres avant de se blottir contre vous et de vous murmurer à l'oreille :{/n} « Jusqu'au trône de l'Exalté ou dans les enfers glacés, peu m'importe, mon amour. Je vous suivrai où que vous alliez. »
